name: Super Simple Pork Chops
author: grandmary
summary: Pork chops with a sweet glaze.  My grandkids love this as do their friends. If your family prefers you can spice it up your way, my family likes it as is.  Great with either mashed or sweet potatoes.
directions: Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat
Brown the pork chops in the hot pan, about 4 to 5 minutes per side
Pour in the apple juice and maple syrup; reduce heat and simmer until the juice has reduced and thickened slightly
Cook until the pork is no longer pink in the center
An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read 145 degrees F (63 degrees C)
